short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your cookies, and keep your privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your cookies, and keep your privacy. This extension sorts first-party from third-party cookies and allows you to delete unnecessary ones. Nowadays, third-party cookies are used for tracking activities on internet and this extension will help you remove such cookies. When auto-delete is turned on, cookies are deleted after a tab is closed.
